live_updates: This issue has been resolved, Thank you for your patience.
Technicians have been dispatched to investigate this issue. Current estimated time of resolution is 22:00 PT.

31357.summary: Some customers in the Central Lonsdale area of North Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
31357.title: Jan 3 - North Vancouver (Central Lonsdale) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available. Thank you for your patience!
Technicians have been dispatched to investigate and resolve this outage as soon as possible.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
31360.summary: Some customers in the Guildford, Fleetwood & Fraser Heights areas of Surrey are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
31360.title: Jan 3 - Surrey (Guildford, Fleetwood & Fraser Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
